definition: to break (e.g. stick or bone)/a loss
to turn sth over/to turn upside down/to tip sth out (of a container)

to break/to fracture/to snap/to suffer loss/to bend/to twist/to turn/to change direction/convinced/to convert into (currency)/discount/rebate/tenth (in price)/classifier for theatrical scenes/to fold/accounts book

sentences.english: You can set a 10 percent discount with it.
sentences.chinese: 这是优惠券，用它你可以打九折。

sentences.english: We’ll give you a 10%(ten percent ) discount.
We give you a ten percent discount during sales promotion.
sentences.chinese: 现在是促销期间，我们给你打九折。
九折实在超出我的谈判限度。

sentences.english: Lobby Crew: We give 10% discount if you book more than five rooms.
sentences.chinese: 如果您定了超过五间房就可以有九折优惠。

sentences.english: Cards holders may enjoy 10% discount from JAZZ's and our co-operation partners.
sentences.chinese: 凭此卡可在本公司各门店及合作伙伴处享有九折优惠。

sentences.english: If you buy one hundred now, I can take off ten percent.
sentences.chinese: 如果你现在用一百元买，我可以给你打九折。

sentences.english: I'm sorry but 180 yuan is the best price I can give you.
sentences.chinese: 我可以给你打九折，这样的话就是180元。

sentences.english: Guests making reservation for buffet dinner can enjoy 10% discount in Eatery.
sentences.chinese: 凡电话预订宜客乐自助晚餐可享九折优惠。

sentences.english: We give a ten percentdiscountfor clung burning ash payment.
sentences.chinese: 对付现金付款，我们给九折优惠。

sentences.english: These items will be discounted by ten percent next week.
sentences.chinese: 这些商品下周将会打九折。

sentences.english: We're offering a special in-show discount of 10%.
sentences.chinese: 在展示会场我们会有打九折的特价。

sentences.english: If you have VIP card , you can get 10% discount .
sentences.chinese: 如果你有贵宾卡，可以享受九折优惠。

sentences.english: In that case, we can knock off l0%.
sentences.chinese: 这样的话，我们可以打九折。

sentences.english: In that case, we can knock off 10%.
sentences.chinese: 这样的话，我们可以打九折。

definition: buy one, get one free/two for the price of one
bond (esp. document split in two, with each party holding one half)/contract/deed (i.e. title deeds)/ticket/voucher/certificate
abbr. for 特別優惠|特别优惠[te4 bie2 you1 hui4]/ex gratia
